query.prompt:
This text is written in Manx. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Ayns meanyraad jeh'n veaynnydain 9 Gheearey-ms dyre delley ta mee er vakin. 28 Erreish my hassoo yn beag my chorp shass, 67 Doort eh rhym: Â«Cha nel mee dooinney, va mee dooinney kied,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Case|Number|Person|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |Ayns|ayns|preposition|||||||| |meanyraad|meanyraad|noun|||sg.||||| |jeh'n|jeh + yn|preposition + definite article|||||||| |veaynnydain|veaynnydain|noun|||sg.||||| |Gheearey-ms|gheearey + ms|verb + 1st person singular present tense marker||||1|present|indicative|| |dyre|dyre|adjective|||||||| |delley|delley|noun|||sg.||||| |ta|ta|verb||||3|present|indicative|| |mee|mee|pronoun|||sg.|1|||| |er|er|preposition|||||||| |vakin|vakin|verb||||1|present|indicative|| |Erreish|erreish|conjunction|||||||| |my|my|particle|||||||| |hassoo|hassoo|verb||||3|present|indicative|| |yn|yn|definite article|||||||| |beag|beag|adjective|||||||| |my|my|pronoun|||sg.|1|||| |chorp|chorp|noun|||sg.||||| |shass|shass|verb||||3|past|indicative|| |Doort|doort|verb||||3|past|indicative|| |eh|eh|pronoun|||sg.|3|||| |rhym|rhym|pronoun|||sg.|2|||| |Cha|cha|verb||||3|present|indicative|| |nel|nel|verb||||3|present|indicative|| |mee|mee|pronoun|||sg.|1|||| |dooinney|dooinney|noun|||sg.||||| |va|va|verb||||3|past|indicative|| |mee|mee|pronoun|||sg.|1|||| |dooinney|dooinney|noun|||sg.||||| |kied|kied|adverb||||||||
